game_description: Legendary Hunter VR is a VR duck hunting game inspired by the old classic NES game Duck Hunt. The game is set on an enchanted place - expect to see a breathtaking moment! Enjoy the day / night cycles with dynamic weather that not only enhances the visual experience a During the day you'll have to face vicious crow attacks, which will not only attack you - but also the bee hives around you. And at night you'll have to survive the wolves and the crocodiles. You have been warned! Make sure that you use your environment wisely. Key Features: -Hunt Duck during the day time while surviving vicious crow and bee hive attacks. -Defend yourself from wolves and crocodiles at night . -Attempt to survive as many nights as you can. Your ammo is limited and you will need to fight for survival. -Wonderful environment. -Realistic gun mechanic and ammo. -Dynamic weather system. -Experience Atmospheric surround sound like never before. *Epilepsy warning: Thunder lightning at night.
review_1: I love this game. One of many I play at least once a day. The only thing I miss is the laughing hunting dog that taunts you when you miss.ðŸ¤£
review_2: Husband and I both enjoy this game! Fun and exciting! Would love to see and add on of amount of ammo you have left.
review_3: I remember playing this game in an arcade back in the '80s & '90s when it was called "Duck Hunter" I'm not a hunter in real life, but I enjoyed playing this game. Shooting the ducks, crows, rabbits, wolves & gators makes it a great game. It changes from day to night back to the day and repeats several times giving you a different atmosphere to play in. I'd like to see more levels with more difficulty levels and new challenges. Add things like geese, deer, and moose to the game. You need to change up the patterns more. Maybe have the gators & wolves attack from different locations instead of the exact same each time. WHY ISN'T THIS GAME BEING SOLD IN THE OCULUS STORE ALREADY?
review_4: Player for 10 min, there is no option to move, you just hold your pistol and shoot which obviously one can't do for more than 5-10 min. Its a great port but game itself is very limited. I would like to get refund if that's possible. Played for not more than 7-8 min
review_5: I don't play this game for long periods of time but it's fun to play for a bit. It's a cool shooter game.
